page.title: 20LOGO at the Beacon School
page.content: {Some pupils' views.} Logo as a language is both useful and interesting. Learning to write LOGO programs on the computer can help you understand how to solve problems. Amazing graphics can be produced with very simple procedures. The beauty of LOGO is that even the youngest child can learn to use it. Anyone can make very artistic patterns with LOGO. Once the use of procedures has been tackled, it is easy to produce patterns and pictures. It is no use thinking that you can draw a hand in 5 minutes. A lot of time has to be taken working out angles and distances. Quite simply, LOGO is drawing with maths. { TO SPIRAL :length :angle :inc { FD :length RT :angle { SPIRAL (:length + :inc) :angle :inc { END
